[00:00.188]
[00:12.117] La-la-la-la-la
[00:18.249] Yeah, it's been a long night and the mirror's telling me to go home (Go home)

[00:26.905] Lotta years went by with my hands tied up in your ropes (Your ropes)
[00:30.412] Forever and ever, no more (No more)
[00:34.592] The midnight sky is the road I'm takin'

[00:49.017] Don't need to be loved by you
[00:52.079] Fire in my lungs, can't fight the Devil on my tongue, oh no

[01:17.469] Loved by you (Loved by you)

[01:32.063] Said, "It ain't so bad if I wanna make a couple mistakes"
[01:36.475] You should know right now that I never stayed put in one place

[01:44.307] The midnight sky is the road I'm takin'
[01:48.864] Head high up in the clouds (Oh, oh)
[01:52.832] I was born to run, I don't belong to anyone, oh no
[01:58.781] Don't need to be loved by you (By you)

[02:10.297] See my lips on her mouth, everybody's talkin' now, baby
[02:15.135] Ooh, you know it's true (Yeah)
[02:18.524] That I was born to run, I don't belong to anyone, oh no
[02:24.603] Don't need to be loved by you (By you)
[02:31.572] Oh
[02:37.472] I don't hide, blurry eyes like you
[02:43.077] Like you
[02:45.496] I was born to run, I don't belong to anyone, oh no
[02:50.743] I don't need to be loved by you (By you)
[02:54.400] Fire in my lungs, can't bite the Devil on my tongue, oh no
[03:00.047] Don't need to be loved by you
[03:02.858] See his hands 'round my waist, thought you never be replaced, baby
[03:06.732] Ooh, you know it's true (Yeah)
[03:10.853] That I was born to run, I don't belong to anyone, oh no
[03:16.847] Don't need to be loved by you (Yeah)
[03:23.711] La-la-la-la-la, la-la
[03:28.523] You know it's true, you know it's true
[03:34.952] Loved by you
tlyric:
[00:00.188]
[00:12.117]
[00:18.249]漫漫长夜 镜子里的倒影告诉我该回家了
[00:22.517]已经过了好久 自我回归单身以来我都感觉良好
[00:26.905]双手紧抓着你抛下的救命绳索 走过无数年
[00:30.412]曾以为的永远 现在已经不再
[00:34.592]行走在午夜的天空
[00:38.991]头顶靠近夜幕的云
[00:43.150]我生而为奔跑 我不属于任何人
[00:49.017]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱
[00:52.079]胸腔中沸腾的火焰 却烧不退到嘴边的恶魔
[00:57.887]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱
[01:00.271]如今换作我与她相吻 现在每个人都在议论纷纷
[01:05.300]你知道我说的是真的
[01:08.936]我生而为奔跑 我不属于任何人
[01:15.209]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱
[01:17.469]被你深爱
[01:21.658]
[01:27.272]她撩起头发 因为她已香汗湿透
[01:32.063]告诉我 如果一个人犯错的话并不意味着她就是坏人
[01:36.475]你该知道我永远不会在一棵树上吊死
[01:40.116]曾以为的永远 现在已经不再
[01:44.307]行走在午夜的天空
[01:48.864]头顶靠近夜幕的云

[02:07.473]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱

[02:24.603]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱
[02:31.572]
[02:37.472]我不会像你一样躲躲藏藏 不敢面对
[02:43.077]
[02:45.496]我生而为奔跑 我不属于任何人
[02:50.743]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱

[03:00.047]因为我根本不需要被你所深爱
[03:02.858]看见他的手搂着我的腰 你还以为不会被取代
[03:06.732]你知道我说的都是真的
[03:10.853]我生而为奔跑 我不属于任何人

[03:28.523]你知道我说的是真的
